homeSubtitle: Empowering citizens to report issues directly to authorities for faster, transparent, and trackable resolutions.
communityText: Community engagement is the art of creating partnership between citizens and governance.
aimText: The Janseva Portal bridges the gap between citizens and authorities. Our mission is to empower communities and ensure accountability in governance through a transparent and accessible platform.
benefits: Empower citizens to raise their voice without barriers.
Ensure accountability with visible and trackable complaints.
Speed up resolutions through direct digital reporting.
Build trust between communities and local governance.
Create cleaner, safer, and more efficient neighborhoods.
